item.title: And Yet, Another Thing I Cannot Figure Out
item.dc:creator: @Fluoxetine Fluoxetine
item.description:
@Fluoxetine wrote:

Maybe it would be a bit like this?

if(text.checkSantaQuest(playerName)){ if(freeSlots() > 5) { if(text.questComplete(playerName)) { giveItem(3721,1);(6541,1);(7759,1);(7763,1);(7771,1) tele(playerName))(PosX,PosY) sendMessage("You Killed Mr Hyde!");} } else { sendMessage("You do not have enough free space to receive items");}}

just a rough guess, im not ANY good at coding so please dont copy and paste, its just to give a more clear idea
hope my newb-ness could help u a bit

Read full topic

item.title: And Yet, Another Thing I Cannot Figure Out
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

I Vain I:

Have you made Mr. Hyde drop all 5 toys upon death?

I don’t want him dropping them on ground to prevent people from grabbing multiples and selling them so people don’t have to fight the Hyde NPC, sooooo, no.

But wouldnt it be the same as if you buy something from a shop, but make it so it basically says If>Santa is killed> give item blah blah blah and tele to PosX,PosY > else > Somebody else took more of Mr Hyde’s HP than you did, Try Again!

i have no idea how that would be written in code terms but u get my gist… right?[/quote]

item.title: And Yet, Another Thing I Cannot Figure Out
item.dc:creator: @Fluoxetine Fluoxetine
item.description:
@Fluoxetine wrote:

Im going out on a limb here as i dont know much about coding yet, im a bit of a noob!
But wouldnt it be the same as if you buy something from a shop and also when u click a portal to teleport but all in one move. So make it so it basically says If> Mr Hyde is killed> give item blah blah blah and tele to PosX,PosY > else > Somebody else took more of Mr Hyde’s HP than you did, Try Again!

i have no idea how that would be written in code terms but u get my gist… right?
